title: Maximum Sum of Subarray
description:
Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of a subarray. A subarray is a contiguous part of the array.
#### Function Signature
```python
def max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:
```

#### Input
- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.
#### Output
- Returns the maximum sum of a subarray.
